DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: The molecular landscape of colorectal cancer reveals genetic mutations.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: We performed whole-exome sequencing of tumor samples and adjacent normal mucosae from 46 patients to characterize the genetic alterations in China.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: We performed whole-exome sequencing of tumor samples and adjacent normal mucosae from 46 patients to characterize the genetic alterations in China.
DESCRIPTOR.CENTER_PROJECT_NAME: 45 pairs of colorectal cancer in COCA-CN project
